LanguageData.AB_UseAgariluxParticlesDesc: The Agarilux Prime mushroom in the Mycotic Jungle produces a cloud of brutally harmful spores that will damage anything. If you dislike this mechanic you can toggle it with this option.
LanguageData.AB_RemoveVanillaBiomesDesc: By enabling this option you can generate a completely alien planet, using only modded biomes.
LanguageData.AB_RemoveOdysseyBiomesDesc: By enabling this option you can remove the Odyssey biomes.
LanguageData.AB_BrighterCragsDescription: Makes the Forsaken Crags quite brighter, for those with a PC screen that makes the Crags WAY too dark. This change takes effect on the next weather change on the map, or on savegame reload.
LanguageData.AB_ShowBuildingsButtonDescription: By default, there will be a "build biome structures" button in the Furniture architect menu. You can use this to build biome specific buildings. But you can also hide it, because reeeee bloat, and then you won't see it. You also won't be able to build them. That's the price to pay.\n\nRequires game reload.
LanguageData.AB_BiomeCommonalities: Biome commonalities. Set to 0 to disable the biome from generating:
LanguageData.AB_MutatorMultiplierTooltip: The commonality of map features in a non-landmark map will be multiplied by this number (20 means a given map feature will be 20 times as common). Requires making a new planet!
LanguageData.AB_LandmarkMutatorMultiplierTooltip: The commonality of map features in landmark maps will be multiplied by this number (20 means a given landmark feature will be 20 times as common). Requires making a new planet!
LanguageData.AB_TerrainCannotSupport_Propane: The pump needs to be built on a solid propane ground
LanguageData.AB_Distance_Propane: Porpane pumps need to be at least 12 tiles apart
LanguageData.AB_OcularForestOnly: This device will only work in an ocular forest
LanguageData.AB_AlphaAnimalsNotInstalled: Since Alpha Animals is not installed, this hive is inactive
LanguageData.AB_MustPlaceOnTarPit: The pump must be built on top of tarred mud or a tar hole
LanguageData.AB_WarningLowEfficiency: Pump acting in low efficiency mode due to absence of Tar Hole
LanguageData.AB_ConvertToAlcyoniteDesc: Convert this solar panel to an Alcyonite solar panel that performs 50% better under the red fog weather.
LanguageData.AB_AlcyoniteSolarPanelsDescription: In this biome. you can convert solar panels to Alcyonite solar panels that perform 50% better under the red fog weather.
LanguageData.AB_AlcyoniteSolarPanels_NotBuildable: To build these, make a solar panel and use the "Convert solar panel" button
LanguageData.AB_PropaneValveDesc: Switches propane flow on/off. A colonist will come open/close the valve.
LanguageData.AB_ExtractPropaneDesc: Extract 150 propane from the tank. A colonist will come to extract it.
LanguageData.AB_Distance_Generic_Fifteen: This building needs to be at least 15 tiles apart from a similar building
LanguageData.AB_AncientFreezingVentStartUp: The ancient freezing vents have become active, lowering temperatures.
LanguageData.AB_AncientFreezingVentShutdown: The ancient freezing vents are stopping.
LanguageData.AB_AncientGreyPallVentStartUp: The ancient gray pall vents have become active, spewing a sickly looking smoke.
LanguageData.AB_AncientGreyPallVentShutdown: The ancient gray pall vents are stopping.
LanguageData.AB_AncientBloodRainVentStartUp: The ancient blood rain vents have become active, spewing a thick blood-red vapor.
LanguageData.AB_AncientBloodRainVentShutdown: The ancient blood rain vents are stopping.
LanguageData.AB_AncientDeathPallVentStartUp: The ancient death pall vents have become active, spewing a rancid cloud of corpse reanimating archites.
LanguageData.AB_AncientDeathPallVentShutdown: The ancient death pall vents are stopping.
LanguageData.AB_AncientDeathPallVentActive: venting cloud of corpse reanimating archites.
LanguageData.AB_SlimeCompressorNotWorking: This slime compressor is not working at the moment
LanguageData.AB_NotReallyAPlant: This is just a disgusting puddle of smelly tar
LanguageData.AB_BiomeBuildingsDesc: Open a menu to build biome-specific buildings.
LanguageData.AB_ResearchNeeded: Can't be built until {0} has been researched by the colony
LanguageData.AB_AmbientRadiationDesc: Due to the ambient radiation in this place, {0} has received the following mutation: {1}
LanguageData.AB_ChooseMineDesc: Choose chunk type to drill. You can choose any of the base game rock types, or random
LanguageData.AB_MultiplierTooltip: This multiplier will affect the spawn changes (commonality) of the {0} when creating a world. Bear in mind that commonalities in biomes are not linear, so you will have to experiment and tweak until you get a biome density that suits your needs. Bear in mind too that this could be affected by other mods that either add new biomes or modify the way the game creates a world.
